reviews.review:
Half-life 2. The product of Valve Corp. Puplished in 2004. If youre an experienced gamer, you would probably already played this game, and some of you did multiply times. Since that Gaming Industry were creating lots of titles for 14 years, using modern technology, and some titles are may be as good as HL2, may be better.  Ive tryed many games during this epriod, and yes, there are some games better than Half-Life 2. But I can't say that you can find any game that can get close to HL2. Its atmosphere, the story and working out on every detail is like to not some many games in the world.
There are a lot of reviews on the internet, and on steam as well, wrote by professional gaming journalists and amateur players, whatever. And Im not a professional journalist and I have none expierence in writing reviews for game or anything, so Im not gonna do that job. I just would like to write here some aspects I would like to share with you my friend, an anonymous gamer.
This game is good in everything, except the couple of bad things:
I dont like the control of person. When you jump on a rail you always fall because the inertia of you in this game is a kind of exaggerated.
The similar thing is all the rest of physics of this game. Im not trying to say physics are bad here, but also they bring you too much trouble, unexpected and not realistic trouble. Object movement make you nervous sometimes.
AI in this game is one the weakest sides of HL2. Combine soldiers dont use any tactics, they just run in the room always one by one right in front of your weapon.
Also there are too many unnecessary "labyrinths" in this game. I couldnt say it is good, some may think it is, like you're solving a puzzle, but in my opinion you just loose too much time for finding an exit.
There was a bigger problem in "Follow Freeman" Chapter when i exploded a mine inside of a room from the outside of the room and the door to it closed. I was running all around this level trying to figure out how can i find a way to a room to shut down a generator, unless i watched a walkthrough and found out that i have to replay this chapter. So be careful, remember that! Lol
Except that the game is excellent. What can we say, its classics, the basics of PC gaming. If you didn't play this game, you know nothing about PC gaming. Thats it my friend
Awesome storyline and gameplay!

Long winded, repetitive and ultimately forgettable.

Edit: Characters are alright but moving through the narrative of this is tedious.  Large sections of the game are overplayed and the it took me months to summon up the motivation to get through the hovercraft sections - any other game I would have thrown aside but I kept at this one for it's reputation.

I get that it's compelling for some people but it lacks the urgency and cohesiveness of Half Life 1.

Important for it's time, but mediocre today.

This game literally blew my fucking mind recently.
It always seemed like a 2007-esque release.

This game was released in 2004.
GTA: San Andreas was released in 2004.
Compare them graphically.

a fun and addictive twist on the classic shooter, half-life 2 puts you into this expansive and complex world as the legendary Gordan Freeman, dispatched by the mysterious G man to be the "right man in the wrong place" and lead the resistance to victory against the oppresive alien Combine. this game is honestly one of my personal favorites, even out of all the games in my library, and it holds a special place in the hearts and minds of many a gamer as one of the best games ever made.
now, if only SOMEONE would get around to making HL3.

Revolución absoluta en el mundo de los videojuegos, si el primer Half-Life fue el inicio de la era moderna del videojuego, este se podría decir que da varios pasos más, innova, imagina y crea algo superior, elevándolo al nivel de arte. Indispensable.

...Все начиналось в каком-то компьютерном клубе где-то в начале 2000 года. Когда ФИФА 1998 надоела, а оплаченное время еще оставалось, админ предложил запустить новинку для игры по сети. Это был HL Opposing Force, потом был КС 1.3, ХЛ2, Портал и тонны мемов, ожидающих от Гейба ХЛ3.
П.С. Ах да, игра... Шедевр, 10/10, маст хэв ;)

Half life é a franquia de jogos que dispensa apresentações, é um daquelas coisas classicas que inspiram novas ideias ate hoje, não é so uma franquia de games, é algo estraordinario que me faz esperar o terceiro jogo da série a uma decada, não quero contar essa frustação que compartilho com milhares de fãs, mas é extremamente revoltante não ter noticias, ou pelo menos comentarios oficiais que estão ou vão trabalhar no game, como um dos jogos que ajudou a popularizar a valve e consequentemente o steam não tem dedicação alguma? 

Mas deixando isso de lado, half life 1 é o jogo que definitivamente fez muitos amantes de jogos escolherem o pc, half life 2 o que mostrou que mesmo um jogo de 2004 ainda tem graficos surpreendentes se comparados a jogos do mesmo ano e comparado com jogos lançados nos dias de hoje, e não falo de jogos indies e sim de grandes empresas de games, as sequencias, as dlcs é que da aquele gostinho de saber como que a história termina, quem é G-man e e como terminará a história de Gordan Freeman.

Half life 2 um si-fy que mistura um mundo apocaliptico, aliens, e ate mesmo uma especie muito legal de zumbi alien, alem dos combine, soldados muito épicos que nos divertem muito nos combates. Olhando essa combinação que escrevi agora parece meio bizarro mas pe um dos melhors games que eu ja joguei
e sem falar na arma mais épica de todos os games uma arma de gravidade zero muito foda de se usar pra atrair peçs do jogo e ate inimigos e jogalos de volta em outras coisas, parece com a arma de Portal, vale muito a pena joga esse game
Благодаря ачивкам играть стало интересней

No decepciona y querrás repetirlo en el futuro. Recomendado 100%

mr freeman, we have much to discuss
10/10

Finished the game approximately a day ago and it was absolutely worth playing. Great to shoot with the weapons. It feels different compared to any other FPS. The plot is not a big deal at all tbh but the game makes playing itself. The most annoying thing was that Gordon had hardly any sound at all. We only get known to our character by doings. The rest of the game is a masterpiece, dont bother complaining about it. Completed it on hard difficulty and switched to easy when progressed the achievements. Recommend to play it on hard, its almost a different game... Spending about 16 hours to a first-timer like me to beat it, and about 4 hours more to do the steam achievements. Accepting the fact its a 10 year-old game its far one of the most enjoyable games I have played. Its a great deal, if you can, do not miss it.
The Game that raises the bar. Very Nice!

10/10

the amazing sequel to Valve's debut game that released way back when CS players hated Steam

Many people seem to have bought this game just for Garry's mod. It might be in your steam library just because of that. I know that's the reason why i bought it anyway. It's a real shame that a lot of people never played this game since it's absolutely an experience. I played through Half life 1 too, but i can't recommend that one. Just look up the story of half life 1 if you're interested, then play HL2 because that one is just great.
You're not a gamer until you play this.

[h1]2202 год.Земля больше не пригодна для жизни,теперь,новый дом-Марс.
В данный момент на бывшем доме землян ведутся раскопки[/h1]...

-Джон,это Земля-1,как слышно?Прием.
-Марс-1,да Джек слышу отлично,как обстоят дела?Прием.
-Неплохо,мы нашли какую-то херь,но началась буря,тем не менее я успел забрать ее в бункер.Прием.
-Земля-1,это Марс-1,берегите себя ребята и кстати что за "хрень" вы нашли?Прием.
-Марс-1,без понятия, прямоугольная коробка с каким-то нарисованным очкариком держащим в руке лом...погоди-ка,да в ней диск есть.На нем что-то написано,неразборчиво-.A.F-IFE 2.Марс-1,что-это?
-Нннеможжет быть...боже...
-Джжон?Джон!твою мать Марс-1,ответьте!что это?Прием?
-Джек,послушай,в руках ты держишь легенду видеоигр!ЛЕГЕНДУ!!!мы нашли ее,нашли!
-Марс-1,что это значит?Это все ради этого?
-Обьясню позже мой друг,о те времена...Valve,Steam,Гейб Ньюел...эх(всхлипывает)
-...Мммарс-1,я не понимаю...Прием?!
-Земля-1,Джек,это великая игра... ее продолжение,3 часть ждали мои:прадедушка,дедушка,отец...они так и не дождались(плачет)
-Мне жаль Джон,мне жаль.
-Земля-1,возвращайтесь домой парни,вы сделали свою работу,обьясню все здесь.Прием
-Так точно Марс-1,принято.

Не помню,что я курил прежде чем написать этот обзор,я незнаю выйдет ли 3 часть,но я знаю одно,эта игра не прекрасна.[b]Она ЛЕГЕНДАРНА,она ЭПОХАЛЬНА![/b]

Усерайтесь,спорьте спорьте,говорите что игра гавно,я скажу это игра вместе с доп black mesa ЛЕГЕНДЫ МАТЬ ЕГО,я забывал пжирать из за них меня увозили в больницу из за недстатка питания и язвы,но я играл играл,мне кажеться если бы мне вткнули мачете в спину,я бы всё равно играл 10/10

Half-Life 2 is one of the best games on the market. This is one of the games that I can strongly say got me into gaming. The physics puzzles, the story, graphics, controls, there isn't a single negative thing I can say about this game. If you're looking for an outstanding game, or just a good place to start, I'd recommend right here.
BEST GAME EVER!

This game was incredible. I can see why people call it the best game of all time. I actually just completed it minutes ago, and I can also see why people really want Half Life 3. The graphics were great, but still somehow made no lag on my laptop which barely runs Skyrin on its lowest settings, it had an amazing story, very fun gameplay, great physics, great AI, facial expressions... I couls go on for hours, but the point is, get this game. If you are on the fence about it, get it. If you don't want to get it, get it. This game is the definition of video game.

Oldie but goodie. Gets right what a lot of games nowadays still get wrong. 
Amazing shooter with realistic physics and remarkable attention to detail for a game this old.
Story is quite good, considering there are no cutscenes and it is all continuous. You never stop being Gordon throughout the game. You control him countinuously through the entire game. 
If you don't want to play through Half Life 1 (like me), it may be a good idea to research the plot and characters of the original, just so you have some idea of what's going on. You don't need to play through it (although the original I have heard is groundbreaking too).
This game is proof that you don't need to buy the latest games to get an extremely fun experience from you game time.
top game

Overall this game is on the top of Best Games Of All Time list, and it will stay there for a long time!

[h1]Rise and shine, Mr. Freeman. Rise and shine[/h1]

Zwischen Half Life 1 und Half Life 2 gab es keinen Shooter, welcher mich inhaltlich auch nur annähernd so an den Monitor fesseln konnte. Ich erinnere mich noch als wäre es gestern gewesen, als ich nach der Installation von Steam und dem Start in diese Story einfach kein Auge mehr zubekommen habe. Kopfhörer hatte ich dazumals keine, so durften meine armen Nachbarn die ganze Nacht, den kriegsähnlichen Geräuschen lauschen, welche aus meinen Lautsprechern schallten. Erst beim Verlassen der Wohnung kam dann von der Nachbartür eine Wortmeldung: "Nix schlafen - Du ganze Nacht machen bumm bumm!" Ich sagte OH, du haben auch gehört? Hahaha so ist das Leben :D

Die bahnbrechendste Erneuerung damals war wohl die sogenannte Gravity Gun, mit der ich als Spieler in der Lage war, Gegenstände anzuheben und wegzuschleudern, was je nach Level und herumliegenden Gegenständen viel Freiraum zum Experimentieren bietet. Ansonsten gefällt mir einfach die Shooter-Mechanik, die wuchtigen Sounds, das Trefferfeedback und vor allem das mysteriöse Storytelling um Mr. Freeman.

Ich finde es nach wie vor schade, dass die Reihe trotz ihres Erfolges nie abgeschlossen wurde aber man kann wohl nicht alles haben.

*****
